translations: n．喇叭手，小号手：吹奏喇叭或小号的人。
· The trumpeters played a fanfare to announce the arrival of the king.
喇叭手吹奏了一段号角，宣告国王的到来。

sentences.translation: 雕刻的号手吹着：“的的嗒！”

sentences.sentence: Now sound no note o trumpeters.
The trumpeters and singers joined in unison, as with one voice, to give praise and thanks to the Lord.
sentences.translation: 吹号的，歌唱的都一齐发声，声合为一，赞美感谢耶和华。
